summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the purchase or acquisition of property and property rights in Snohomish and King Counties for a right of way for an electric transmission system from a connection with the City's Skagit electric transmission system at a point in Snohomish County in Section 17, Township 27 North, Range 5 East, W.M., to and around the easterly shore of Lake Washington, to the vicinity of Bryn Mawr in King County; and amending Section 5 of Ordinance No. 51989.
